metadata.title: Tuesday, 8th October, 2013
metadata.session: THIRD SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)who owns Kasempa Mining and Natural Resources Foundation Limited;
(b)what the names of shareholders of Katoka Mine in Kasempa District are;
(c)whether Lions Resources Company Limited owns any mine in Kasempa;
(d)if so, what the name of the mine is; and

questions.minister: Minister of Transport, Works, Supply and Communication
parts: (a)when the Government will construct an airstrip in Isoka District; and
(b)whether the people living on the land earmarked for the airstrip will be relocated.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development how much money is spent, per month, to run the thermal generators in the following districts
Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)how many teachers were at Mapande Basic School in Solwezi East Parliamentary Constituency as of August, 2013;
(b)what the staff establishment of the school is; and
(c)when the Government will construct permanent structures at the school.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)what has caused the delay in the construction of a secondary school at Lwela in Senior Chief Milambo’s area in Milenge District; and
(b)what the estimated cost of the project is. ORDER OF THE DAY 1    Thanks - His Excellency the President’s Address – Motion (24th September) - Resumption of Debate - (Ms Namugala).
